column4: I just installed U904  desktop, is there a metapakage for a lamp stack or do I have to install each component separately?
I think you have to install each comp separately
th0r , thanks a lot
you know how to do it ?
yes but when you install the server it is done in a easy way you dont have to do one by one...
I believe that if you do aptitude install phpmyadmin mysql-server. It should download apache, php and mysql-server.
that si nice ;-)
but it doesn't cost much to add apache on the line. Check the correct name with an aptitude search apache
ok thanks a lot, let me see what version of php and mysql that installs...
indead, maybe you should precise which version of php you want. I'm not sure which one it takes by default
php5, mysql5 and apache2
sounds good to me. But in my case, I also take phpmyadmin to set up the database easily
yep definitely, me too... ;-)
if i install via tasksel will it be compatible with update manager ?
I don't know tasksel but I've always done with aptitude
do you know what the carrot does in this command? sudo apt-get install lamp-server^
I don't understand your question
do you know what the carrat at the end of this command line does in this command? sudo apt-get install lamp-server^
nope but it shouldn't be there
i guess it's for regular expression
I've never used it
thanks a lot too ;-)
